references.reason: This paper provides a technical report on GPT-4, a large language model that is foundational to many of the models discussed and compared in this work.
This paper is highly influential in establishing the capabilities of large language models as few-shot learners which is critical to the advancement of vision-language models.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models
references.reason: This paper introduces LLaMA, an open-source large language model, which is used as the backbone language model for Video-Panda.
This paper is foundational for the video-language model, as it introduces video-chat-centric video understanding. This work is directly compared to Video-Panda's performance.

references.paper_title: Video-chatgpt: Towards detailed video understanding via large vision and language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the Video-ChatGPT model, which is directly compared against and used for fine-tuning Video-Panda.
